item.title: System Shock 2 Remake in the Source Engine
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
That’s just a test level he made. I think he wants to generate interest to really start a remake project but I think it’s gonna be a bit hard to go ahead with that, since the System Shock 2 rights are split between EA and an insurance company.
